title: Textile, 1853–71
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block and roller printed on plain weave
description: Oblong fragment, probably for a valance, of a coarsely printed cotton in strong colors, now faded. Design shows Empress Eugenie, Napoleon III and the Prince Imperial on the right with the coat of arms for Napoleon III on the left. Both are enframed with floral wreaths.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1853–71. Medium: cotton
Technique: block and roller printed on plain weave. 1954-107-2-b.
